mapper.select: select OPEN_ACCOUNT, OPEN_BANK, OPEN_ANAME, OPEN_NAME, OPEN_PASSWORD, OPEN_BALANCE from OPENBANK
mapper.insert: insert into openbank (open_account, open_bank, open_aname, open_name, open_password, open_balance) values (#{open_account}, #{open_bank}, #{open_aname},#{open_name},#{open_password},#{open_balance})
